text: Party Membership Card () is a 1936 Soviet drama movie directed by Ivan Pyryev.С серпом, молотом и следами ржавчины. Особые приметы советского паспортаПоединок It stars Andrei Abrikosov, Anatoliy Goryunov, and Igor Maleyev. == Actors == * Andrei Abrikosov as Pavel Kurganov * Anatoliy Goryunov as Feodor * Igor Maleyev as Yasha * Ada Vojtsik as Anna == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1936 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ivan Pyryev
title: Party Membership Card
